messages.title: Beware of Labour's lies and smears
messages.content: Only last year Gordon Brown's own spin doctor was forced to quit after his plans for an election smear campaign became public. Now with Labour more desperate than ever, voters must guard for more Labour lies and smears.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Remember the choice in many parts of Britain is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour.

issues.governance: Damian McBride was part of a wider dirty tricks team at the heart of Downing Street

quotes.text: The Prime Minister's personal spin doctor Damian McBride quit after it emerged he...conspired to spread tales and sinister stories of a highly personal nature.
Damian McBride was part of a wider dirty tricks team at the heart of Downing Street

images.caption: Brown is growing more desperate by the day...
